# stack

Stacks are the different application execution environments available in the Heroku platform.

## Actions

### `info`

`heroku.stacks({stack_id_or_name}).info({callback});`

Method | Path
--- | ---
GET | /stacks/{stack_id_or_name}

### `list`

`heroku.stacks().list({callback});`

Method | Path
--- | ---
GET | /stacks
